video.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
video.synopsis: Four narcissistic friends run a Philadelphia bar where their juvenile behavior brings situations from uncomfortable to hysterically horrible.

episodes.synopsis: The guys hire Dee's friend as a promoter for the bar and get more than they bargained for. Charlie seeks black friends to prove he isn't a racist.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Racist

episodes.synopsis: Charlie is skeptical when a girl from his past reveals he is the father of her child, but he finds an unexpected perk in acting as the brat's father.
episodes.title: Charlie Wants an Abortion

episodes.synopsis: After noting a rise in underage patrons, the gang makes accommodations for the younger crowd and gets caught up in petty school politics and crushes.
episodes.title: Underage Drinking: A National Concern

episodes.synopsis: The gang learns that Charlie might have cancer and hatches a shallow-minded plan to alleviate his anguish. Meanwhile, Mac gets involved with a tranny.
episodes.title: Charlie Has Cancer

episodes.synopsis: Upon learning that the bar's safe has been stolen, the guys take matters into their own hands and buy a gun.
episodes.title: Gun Fever

episodes.synopsis: Mac and Dennis pretend to be acquainted with a patron found dead in their bar in order to get closer to the dead man's granddaughter.
episodes.title: The Gang Finds a Dead Guy

episodes.synopsis: The gang learns that Charlie and Mac's high school gym teacher has been accused of molestation, and they worry when Charlie reacts oddly to the news.
episodes.title: Charlie Got Molested

episodes.synopsis: The gang discovers the perks of being handicapped when Charlie becomes wheelchair-bound after an accident. Dennis and Dee's estranged father returns.
episodes.title: Charlie Gets Crippled

episodes.synopsis: The gang discovers they may lose part of the bar due to a zoning mishap and use unorthodox measures to remedy the situation.
episodes.title: The Gang Goes Jihad

episodes.synopsis: Dennis and Dee quit their jobs and concoct a plan to get welfare benefits so they can pursue their real, and completely unrealistic, dreams and goals.
episodes.title: Dennis and Dee Go on Welfare

episodes.synopsis: Jealous of Frank's newfound happiness reconnecting with his kids and reliving his youth, Barbara gets back at Frank by having sex with Mac.
episodes.title: Mac Bangs Dennis' Mom

episodes.synopsis: After getting mugged, Dee agrees to take boxing lessons from Frank. Meanwhile, Mac and Dennis enter Charlie in an underground street fight.
episodes.title: Hundred Dollar Baby

episodes.synopsis: After being arrested for arson, the gang is sentenced to community service. Charlie is ordered to attend AA, where he makes a startling discovery.
episodes.title: The Gang Gives Back

episodes.synopsis: When a leaky pipe creates a water stain on the wall that resembles the Virgin Mary's likeness, the gang argues over how to exploit the "miracle."
episodes.title: The Gang Exploits a Miracle

episodes.synopsis: The gang explores corrupt local politics, but their initial pursuit of a quick cash pay-off soon falls to the wayside when Dennis runs for office.
episodes.title: The Gang Runs for Office

episodes.synopsis: While the gang debates the constitutionality of various bans on people's rights, Mac and Dennis turn Paddy's into a "freedom zone" with no rules.
episodes.title: Charlie Goes America All Over Everybody's Ass

episodes.synopsis: Dee is concerned when she receives numerous emails on her MySpace page from a stranger claiming to be her and Dennis's father.
episodes.title: Dennis and Dee Get a New Dad

episodes.synopsis: Dennis joins an environmentalist group, but he's snubbed by the activists. Dee and Mac decide to raise a baby they find in a dumpster.
episodes.title: The Gang Finds a Dumpster Baby

episodes.synopsis: When the Philadelphia Eagles hold open tryouts, Mac, Dennis and Dee use the event for their own personal competition. Frank and Charlie tailgate.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Invincible

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Dee are left out of Barbara's will. For Dennis, the thrill of inheriting his mom's mansion is tempered by the realization he has no friends.
episodes.title: Dennis and Dee's Mom Is Dead

episodes.synopsis: The McPoyle brothers and sister Margaret take the gang hostage at Paddy's, raising the stakes to a new level in the feud between the two groups.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Held Hostage

episodes.synopsis: Dee discovers that the biggest loser and fatty from high school is now a successful and thin fashion designer ... now making Dee the biggest loser.
episodes.title: The Aluminum Monster vs. Fatty Magoo

episodes.synopsis: The gang declares war against a Korean restaurateur who threatens to bump Paddy's from the city's annual pub crawl.
episodes.title: The Gang Solves the North Korea Situation

episodes.synopsis: The gang agrees to sell Paddy's when they get an offer that's too good to refuse. As non-partners in the bar, Dee and Charlie are left in the lurch.
episodes.title: The Gang Sells Out

episodes.synopsis: The gang tries to become local celebrities by creating their own public access news show and making it big on the hip club scene.
episodes.title: Frank Sets Sweet Dee On Fire

episodes.synopsis: Dee may finally find true love when she dates a famous local rapper, who may or may not be mentally retarded.
episodes.title: Sweet Dee's Dating a Retarded Person

episodes.synopsis: Mac's behavior leads Frank, Dennis and Dee to suspect he's a killer. Charlie uses the legal knowledge he's learned from TV to prove Mac's innocence.
episodes.title: Mac Is a Serial Killer

episodes.synopsis: Dennis is mistaken for a recently released child molester but is more upset that he's being mistaken for a fat person than a sex offender.
episodes.title: Dennis Looks Like a Registered Sex Offender

episodes.synopsis: When the gang find themselves in debt to the mob after a misunderstanding, Dennis is forced to pimp himself as a male escort. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Whacked: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When the gang find themselves in debt to the mob after a misunderstanding, Dennis is forced to pimp himself as a male escort. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Whacked: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: To rid the neighborhood of undesirables, Mac and Dee become vigilantes, while Frank and Dennis impersonate police officers.
episodes.title: Bums: Making a Mess All Over the City

episodes.synopsis: Charlie inadvertently puts Paddy's up as the grand prize in a dance marathon, and the gang is forced to enter the competition to save their bar.
episodes.title: The Gang Dances Their Asses Off

episodes.synopsis: After mistakenly eating human meat, Dee and Charlie develop an insatiable cannibalistic hunger. Meanwhile, Mac and Dennis hunt Rickety Cricket.
episodes.title: Mac and Dennis: Manhunters

episodes.synopsis: Mac, Dennis and Charlie take advantage of rising gas prices by investing in barrels of gasoline and selling them door to door.
episodes.title: The Gang Solves the Gas Crisis

episodes.synopsis: After investing in a billboard, Frank and Mac judge a competition to find Paddy's next top model. Dennis competes.
episodes.title: America's Next Top Paddy's Billboard Model Contest

episodes.synopsis: Charlie asks Mac, his best friend, to beat up the waitress's new boyfriend. The only problem is that Mac is that guy.
episodes.title: Mac's Banging the Waitress

episodes.synopsis: After Mac's father is released from prison, Mac and Charlie stage their own deaths to save their lives. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: Mac and Charlie Die: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After Mac and Charlie stage their own deaths, Frank, Dee and Dennis find unique ways of dealing with the loss. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: Mac and Charlie Die: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Charlie find someone has pooped in their bed, leading Mac and Dennis to join them as they attempt to find the culprit.
episodes.title: Who Pooped the Bed?

episodes.synopsis: When a reporter writes a review naming Paddy's "the worst bar in Philadelphia," the gang kidnaps the man to try to change his mind.
episodes.title: Paddy's Pub: The Worst Bar in Philadelphia

episodes.synopsis: After finding Dennis's erotic memoir, Mac and Frank attempt to profit from the masterpiece. Dee and Charlie spend a day in each other's shoes.
episodes.title: Dennis Reynolds: An Erotic Life

episodes.synopsis: After Dee suffers a heart attack, she and Dennis try a healthier lifestyle. Charlie and Mac join the corporate work force to get health insurance.
episodes.title: Sweet Dee Has a Heart Attack

episodes.synopsis: To make their bar a local landmark, the gang tells the Philadelphia Historical Society how Paddy's Pub was responsible for cracking the Liberty Bell.
episodes.title: The Gang Cracks the Liberty Bell

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to make their own dreams come true, the gang decides to pay it forward and give one unlucky family an extreme home makeover.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Extreme: Home Makeover Edition

episodes.synopsis: Charlie, with the help of the rest of the gang, stages a rock opera based on his song "Nightman."
episodes.title: The Nightman Cometh

episodes.synopsis: While Frank, Mac and Dennis try their hand at real estate, Dee arranges to be a surrogate mother to a wealthy couple with a sweet house.
episodes.title: The Gang Exploits the Mortgage Crisis

episodes.synopsis: The gang attempts to expand their horizons by taking a road trip to the Grand Canyon.
episodes.title: The Gang Hits the Road

episodes.synopsis: While Mac and Dennis try to keep Paddy's afloat, Frank and Dee start a family business. A shantytown of newly poor people is forming outside the bar.
episodes.title: The Great Recession

episodes.synopsis: When Frank's reckless lifestyle becomes an inconvenience for the gang, they call for an intervention.
episodes.title: The Gang Gives Frank an Intervention

episodes.synopsis: Jealous that the Waitress is beating her to the altar, Dee tries to derail the wedding. The guys distract Charlie by getting him in the dating scene.
episodes.title: The Waitress Is Getting Married

episodes.synopsis: The gang tells a judge the troubles they encountered during game 5 of the 2008 World Series in hopes that it will clear them of a parking citation.
episodes.title: The World Series Defense

episodes.synopsis: The gang puts on a wrestling show for the returning troops. Meanwhile, the soldier Dee has been chatting with online isn't what she expected.
episodes.title: The Gang Wrestles for the Troops

episodes.synopsis: When a merchandising convention comes to town, the gang tries to develop marketable products in an attempt to build the Paddy's brand.
episodes.title: Paddy's Pub: Home of the Original Kitten Mittens

episodes.synopsis: Relationships are put to the test when Mac and Dennis decide to spend some time apart.
episodes.title: Mac and Dennis Break Up

episodes.synopsis: Dennis reveals his foolproof system for seducing any woman to the rest of the gang, but none of them can seem to grasp it.
episodes.title: The D.E.N.N.I.S. System

episodes.synopsis: Dee lands herself a role in the new M. Night Shyamalan movie, and Mac and Charlie see it as the perfect opportunity to sell their movie script.
episodes.title: Mac and Charlie Write a Movie

episodes.synopsis: After serving a 10-year ban, the Paddy's team is once again eligible to compete in Flipadelphia, a citywide flip cup tournament.
episodes.title: The Gang Reignites the Rivalry

episodes.synopsis: Mac pulls out the big guns to protect the sanctity of marriage, while the rest of the gang reaps the rewards of marital bliss.
episodes.title: Mac Fights Gay Marriage

episodes.synopsis: Marital bliss turns to marital business as the gang experiences the emotional and economic tribulations of divorce.
episodes.title: Dennis Gets Divorced

episodes.synopsis: The gang attempts to open themselves up to the adventures of the sea after they purchase their "new" boat.
episodes.title: The Gang Buys a Boat

episodes.synopsis: Mac finally gets his big break after correctly answering a trivia question on the radio. Frank, Dennis and Dee turn their banter into a podcast.
episodes.title: Mac's Big Break

episodes.synopsis: After getting denied by the local pool club, Mac and Charlie aim to fix up an abandoned pool in order to beat the heat wave.
episodes.title: Mac and Charlie: White Trash

episodes.synopsis: Charlie and Mac set up an odd couple after Mac's mom burns the house down, and Frank discovers the importance of paternal care when Dee falls ill.
episodes.title: Mac's Mom Burns Her House Down

episodes.synopsis: When Dee reveals she's pregnant, the guys hazily recall their last Halloween party to determine if one of them might be the father.
episodes.title: Who Got Dee Pregnant?

episodes.synopsis: A blast from the past prompts the guys to expand membership and Dee to reconsider her future.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets a New Member

episodes.synopsis: Dee takes a job as a substitute drama teacher and shows her students the gang's take on the Lethal Weapon series: Lethal Weapon 5.
episodes.title: Dee Reynolds: Shaping America's Youth

episodes.synopsis: When keeping the basement rodent-free drives Charlie to the brink, the gang puts the cynicism aside and throws a surprise party to cheer him up.
episodes.title: Charlie Kelly: King of the Rats

episodes.synopsis: En route to Atlantic City for a charity benefit, Frank, Dee and Mac get stuck in the woods, while Dennis and Charlie have the night of their lives.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Stranded in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Before Dee's baby arrives, the gang tries to figure out who is the father by throwing a house party for all her former flings.
episodes.title: Dee Gives Birth

episodes.synopsis: The gang embarks on a holiday adventure filled with stolen toys, naked elves and a bloody run-in with Santa Claus that is guaranteed to spread cheer.
episodes.title: A Very Sunny Christmas

episodes.synopsis: With Frank intent on marrying a prostitute, the gang makes the best of it by trying to uncover the heart of gold inside Frank's "pretty woman."
episodes.title: Frank's Pretty Woman

episodes.synopsis: Dee and Dennis take the gang to their favorite childhood vacation spot, where things aren't quite how they remember.
episodes.title: The Gang Goes to the Jersey Shore

episodes.synopsis: Frank accidentally gets into the child pageantry business and is terrified of coming across as a "diddler."
episodes.title: Frank Reynolds' Little Beauties

episodes.synopsis: Desperate times call for truly sad and horrific measures as Sweet Dee tries to get out of an IRS audit.
episodes.title: Sweet Dee Gets Audited

episodes.synopsis: The gang is shocked to meet Frank's long-lost brother, Gino, when he unexpectedly arrives at Paddy's Pub and exposes a wealth of family secrets.
episodes.title: Frank's Brother

episodes.synopsis: With an apocalyptic storm headed toward Philly, the gang joins the panicking masses in a race to secure scarce resources.
episodes.title: The Storm of the Century

episodes.synopsis: What's the gang to do on a rainy day? Dee and Dennis square off against Mac, Charlie and Frank in a twisted battle of wits, wild cards and wine.
episodes.title: Chardee MacDennis: The Game of Games

episodes.synopsis: After a bar patron enrages the gang, Mac and Dee take to the Internet to stalk their prey, while Dennis and Charlie track him the old-fashioned way.
episodes.title: The ANTI-Social Network

episodes.synopsis: The gang's plan to extract an "artifact" from a residence is jeopardized when the owners turn out to be home.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Trapped

episodes.synopsis: Step inside the confession booth with Mac as he tells a befuddled priest why the rest of the gang is at fault for his fatness.
episodes.title: How Mac Got Fat

episodes.synopsis: The gang will do whatever it takes to see the hottest action movie of the summer, Thunder Gun Express, before it leaves the theaters.
episodes.title: Thunder Gun Express

episodes.synopsis: The gang attends their high school reunion with a lot to prove. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: The High School Reunion

episodes.synopsis: The gang devises a new plan of attack at their high school reunion. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: The High School Reunion: Part 2: The Gang's Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Dennis and Dee's ailing grandfather Pop-Pop is wasting away in the hospital, and they have to decide whether or not to pull the plug. But things get complicated when The Gang learns of Pop-Pop's history as a Nazi.
episodes.title: Pop-Pop: The Final Solution

episodes.synopsis: The gang eye a trash-collecting contract with the city of Philadelphia after the town's garbage collectors go on strike.
episodes.title: The Gang Recycles Their Trash

episodes.synopsis: Dennis and the gang crash Maureen's wedding to make certain he'll be able to sever all ties, only to discover a union much scarier than kissing cousins.
episodes.title: The Maureen Ponderosa Wedding Massacre

episodes.synopsis: When Charlie and Dee invade the rarefied world of the 1%, they find a romantic connection with two members of one of Philly's wealthiest families.
episodes.title: Charlie and Dee Find Love

episodes.synopsis: The Gang gets Freudian as they step into the therapist's office to work through their mountain of issues.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Analyzed

episodes.synopsis: In perhaps the most depraved scheme of them all, The Gang rallies around Charlie's mom as she battles cancer.
episodes.title: Charlie's Mom Has Cancer

episodes.synopsis: With Charlie under his wing, Frank cleans up so he can get his hands dirty and help out his old company with one last big merger. While an unwritten rule of the bar gets the rest of the gang caught up in a case of mistaken identity.
episodes.title: Frank's Back in Business

episodes.synopsis: After slipping into an unhealthy obsession with computer games, The Gang wrestles to define the difference between the real and the virtual worlds.
episodes.title: Charlie Rules the World

episodes.synopsis: Every member of The Gang has something to celebrate at Guigino's, Philly's finest eatery.
episodes.title: The Gang Dines Out

episodes.synopsis: Court is in session at Paddy's Pub as Frank and Dennis present their cases to the rest of the gang, resulting in a verdict that will change their lives FOREVER...but not really.
episodes.title: Reynolds vs. Reynolds: The Cereal Defense

episodes.synopsis: Dee embraces the desperate, self-loathing qualities the guys have beaten into her over the years, sending her stand-up comedy to unexpected places.
episodes.title: The Gang Broke Dee

episodes.synopsis: After Frank appears on TV advocating gun ownership, the rest of the gang takes a look at the ownership process and alternatives to find common ground.
episodes.title: Gun Fever Too: Still Hot

episodes.synopsis: Tired of failing to be recognized for their years in the bar industry, the gang changes their ways to give the patrons what they think they want.
episodes.title: The Gang Tries Desperately to Win an Award

episodes.synopsis: The gang does their best to recoup their investments in questionable schemes by dumping their losses on Ben the soldier.
episodes.title: Mac and Dennis Buy a Timeshare

episodes.synopsis: Everyone in the gang gets a day to do what they want while everyone else in the gang must participate willingly. This is Mac's day.
episodes.title: Mac Day

episodes.synopsis: When a trip to a convenience store places the gang in the middle of an armed robbery, each of them explores how they react in extreme situations.
episodes.title: The Gang Saves the Day

episodes.synopsis: When a severe flu outbreak sweeps Philadelphia the gang quarantine themselves inside of Paddy's in an attempt to keep their singing voices pristine.
episodes.title: The Gang Gets Quarantined

episodes.synopsis: When an experiment multiplies Charlie's intellect and takes him away from the bar, the rest of the gang struggle to complete menial "Charlie work."
episodes.title: Flowers for Charlie

episodes.synopsis: Creative differences over what constitutes tasteful nudity cause Frank to pull his money out of Lethal Weapon 6 during filming.
episodes.title: The Gang Makes Lethal Weapon 6

episodes.synopsis: When some bad blood with old foes compromises their ideal Thanksgiving, the gang decides to make amends by breaking bread with those they've hurt.
episodes.title: The Gang Squashes Their Beefs
